hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT INCOME_TYPE_ID, INCOME_TYPE, ORG_CATEGORY, DESCRIPTION, ACCOUNT_CODE, GST_PERCENTAGE, TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER_ID, IS_APPLY_GST, PARENT_INCOME_TYPE, SORT_ORDER, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER_ID FROM SYS_INCOME_TYPE WHERE 1 = 1 ${auto_fill} ${frameworkGeneratedWhere} ${frameworkGeneratedOrderBy} FOR UPDATE

INSERT INTO SYS_INCOME_TYPE ( INCOME_TYPE_ID, INCOME_TYPE, ORG_CATEGORY, DESCRIPTION, ACCOUNT_CODE, GST_PERCENTAGE, INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER_ID, IS_APPLY_GST, PARENT_INCOME_TYPE, SORT_ORDER, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER_ID ) VALUES ( ${INCOME_TYPE_ID}, ${INCOME_TYPE}, ${ORG_CATEGORY}, ${DESCRIPTION}, ${ACCOUNT_CODE}, ${GST_PERCENTAGE}, ${INSERT_DATE}, ${INSERT_USER_ID}, ${IS_APPLY_GST}, ${PARENT_INCOME_TYPE}, ${SORT_ORDER}, ${UPDATE_DATE}, ${UPDATE_USER_ID} )

UPDATE SYS_INCOME_TYPE SET INCOME_TYPE = ${INCOME_TYPE}, ORG_CATEGORY = ${ORG_CATEGORY}, DESCRIPTION = ${DESCRIPTION}, ACCOUNT_CODE = ${ACCOUNT_CODE}, GST_PERCENTAGE = ${GST_PERCENTAGE}, INSERT_DATE = ${INSERT_DATE}, INSERT_USER_ID = ${INSERT_USER_ID}, IS_APPLY_GST = ${IS_APPLY_GST}, PARENT_INCOME_TYPE = ${PARENT_INCOME_TYPE}, SORT_ORDER = ${SORT_ORDER}, UPDATE_DATE = ${UPDATE_DATE}, UPDATE_USER_ID = ${UPDATE_USER_ID} WHERE 1 = 1 ${frameworkGeneratedWhere}
